X This is not unfrequently the case in the 
Sheep. 
XX In <s>Capr<\s> the Common Goat the nasals scarcely taper 
at all towards the front 
XXX [text goats?] Sheep differ a good in this respect 
In the female skull in the College of Surgeons 
it is very shallow, in the two skulls of old mal[es] 
in the same Collection very broad & deep 
o lachrymal fossa
